problem_text_cn: 如图,∠AOB=30°,点P为∠AOB内一点,OP=10,点M、N分别在OA、OB上,求△PMN周长的最小值()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, ∠AOB = N_0, point P is a point in ∠AOB, OP = N_1, points M and N are respectively on OA and OB, find the minimum value of the perimeter of △PMN ()
raw_answer: 解:分别作点P关于OA、OB的对称点P~1~、P~2~,连P~1~、P~2~,交OA于M,交OB于N,则OP~1~=OP=OP~2~,∠P~1~OA=∠POA,∠POB=∠P~2~OB,MP=P~1~M,PN=P~2~N,则△PMN的周长的最小值=P~1~P~2~∴∠P~1~OP~2~=2∠AOB=60°,∴△OP~1~P~2~是等边三角形．△PMN的周长=P~1~P~2~,∴P~1~P~2~=OP~1~=OP~2~=OP=10．故选:B．o*z^{z}=2x^{-2}+2➝{ZZ}^{-2}+2➝{ZZ}^{-2}
